name: HealthcareAgentPowersOrLimitationsIndicator
title: Healthcare Agent Powers or Limitations Indicator
description: This value set is closely related to a value set defined by the FHIR ADI IG with a title of Healthcare Agent Powers or Limitations Indicator and the name PADIParticipantConsentTypeVS  http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pacio-adi/ValueSet/PADIParticipantConsentTypeVS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes indicating if the information represents powers or limitations of a healthcare agent.),(Data Element Scope: The code is used in the code element of an Observation in CDA, or a scope element within a FHIR Consent resource.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include only the concepts for powers granted to healthcare agent and limitations placed on healthcare agent.),(Exclusion Criteria: Do not include concepts for the role of Patient Healthcare agent or the role of Healthcare agent advisor.)
